summary: CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE #99R33, IN MARCH, 2003, BUT WHEN SHE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER, THEY STATED THAT THEY COULD NOT REPAIR THE VEHICLE BECAUSE THE CONSUMER DID NOT LIVE IN THE AFFECTED AREA.  THE CONSUMER STATED THAT HER VEHICLE WAS ACTING AS THE RECALL SUGGESTED.  THE VEHICLE LEAKED GAS FROM THE GAS TANK.  WHEN CONSUMER PARKED THE VEHICLE AND HAD GONE BACK THERE, GAS WAS ON THE GROUND.  THE CONSUMER WANTED THE VEHICLE REPAIRED UNDER THE RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE.   *AK   THE FUEL TANK WAS REPLACED AT THE CONSUMER'S EXPENSE.   *SCC
